name: HEMS Technology
tag_list: han, hems, smart-grid, cleantech, energy-management, smart-metering
overview:
We develop and manufacture low cost, plug and play wireless appliance power monitors that can be easily integrated with OEM commercial or residential energy management systems.

We’re a startup in cleantech/smart grid markets that is moving out from the R&D stage into a global sales and marketing. Our focus is on wireless smart sockets that are part of a home or office network for control and monitor of appliance electricity use.

We’re interested in companies that have a home energy management solution and need sensor devices for that product line. Our UL916 certified HEMS 220 smartACsocketsâ„¢ appliance power monitors can be easily integrated with existing systems and networks. Please feel free to call me or email me for discussion.
